categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Richard Franklin (born January 15, 1936) is a British actor who portrayed Sirro Argonne in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story.
Outside of Star Wars, Franklin is best known for his portrayal of Capt. Mike Yates on  Doctor Who in the early-to-mid '70s, during Jon Pertwee's tenure as the Doctor.
